column5: My grandparents have a house that is full of JUNK, they also have a fair sized gararge that needs to be emptyed out. They need to find a company service where they can rent one of those big garbage bins for a weekend or something. We are in Oshawa and they are looking for a website with a approx $$ on how much it will cost. As anybody there looking to pay the lowest and get the best deal.  Any help for them would be greatly appreciated!  Thanks in adv, Mike
I know it's kind of difficult for some people to grasp the idea of the YELLOW pages, but that would be a good place to start..
Very hard to grasp indeed, maybe finding a phone book would help to eh. Thanks for the help, we didn't think of that already
How bout a garage sale? Lot of unemployed people in the Shwa now, they could use a good deal on a couch or something.
I just went into Google and typed "junk removal, oshawa" and came up with this.  http://www.1888junkquick.com/index.html  Looks like a few more in there to pick from too.
There is a company on Wentworth St W., just west of GM called Pebblestone Multi-Services.  They offer bin drop off, removal and disposal services.  You can reach them at 905-725-0899.
